text: Ljubo Andrijašević (; born 18 February 1984) is a Serbian football goalkeeper who plays for Tekstilac Odžaci in Serbian League Vojvodina. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:People from Odžaci Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Serbian footballers Category:FK Radnički Sombor players Category:FK Hajduk Kula players Category:FK Veternik players Category:Serbian SuperLiga players
title: Ljubo Andrijašević
